Comments.Message:
hey what's wrong if I cant see
using System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration.Conventions.Edm.Db;
Automatically pluralizing table names before looking for them is ridiculous, especially making the option of not doing so, so difficult.  Microsoft needs to change this behavior!
